This morning’s App Store deals are now ready to roll alongside the now live pre-orders on the new AirPods Pro 3, Apple Watch Ultra 3, and Apple Watch Series 11. Today’s collection features a load of big-time classics from the Final Fantasy series and Mana series alongside some Romancing SaGa titles, and more. Just be sure to also scope out the deals we are tracking today on the most affordable 24GB M4 Mac mini, an even lower price on Apple’s new 2025 model 25W Qi2 MagSafe Charger, this MacBook Pro at $300 off, and iPhone 15 Pro at $430 less than the iPhone 17. items.title: Limewire Now Owns The Rights To Fyre Festival

Limewire, the early 2000s P2P file-sharing program that was used primarily to share pirated music, and later revived as an NFT marketplace, has made news by purchasing the rights to Fyre Festival. The now NFT marketplace reportedly paid close to US$250,000 (~RM1.05 million) for it, with plans to possibly transform it into a new music […]

items.title: ESR’s iPhone 17 rugged MagSafe cases with Camera Control button now 62% off from just $12
items.summary:
While you can still grab a 3-pack of translucent iPhone 17 MagSafe cases for just $5 each, we just spotted another deal for folks looking for some rugged options. ESR’s Cyber series rugged cases for the iPhone 17 are up to 62% off right now, starting at just $11.99 Prime shipped. Folks without a Prime membership will have to checkout with items worth over $35 in the cart to dodge the shipping fee. Enter promo code ESR2025NEW at checkout to lock in the discounted prices. Both versions – with or without the built-in camera stand – are available for the standard iPhone 17, Air, and Pro models. The $30 standard rugged case is $11.99, while the one with the stand is down to $14.99 Prime shipped from $40.

Among the models seeing these discounts, two stand atop the rest as the perfect duo to tackle all the cleaning needs of your favorite swimming hole right in your own backyard. items.title: Bluetti’s power station and alternator bundles see up to $1,000 in savings with exclusive pricing from $618

Leading the lineup, there is Bluetti’s new Apex 300 Portable Power Station bundled with an Alternator Charger 1 at $1,619.10 shipped, after using the exclusive code 9TO5TOYS10F at checkout for an additional $180 in savings, beating out Amazon’s currently $1,799 pricing. This bundle would fetch 2,699 outside of discounts, with a higher $2,799 pricing at Amazon. Since its release at the top of August, this bundle has only been dropped between $2,099 and $1,799 outside of the exclusive savings on the series that is continuing with this sale. You’ll not only be getting $1,080 cut from the tag, but you’ll be getting the all-time lowest price we have tracked to date. Head below for the full lineup of discounted bundles.
